str2: Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To be weak (physically: then morally), To be sick. From asthenes; to be feeble.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and krino; to conclude for oneself, i.e. to respond; by Hebraism to begin to speak.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I cast, throw, rush, (b) often, in the weaker sense: I place, put, drop. A primary verb; to throw.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(lit: a diving or swimming place), a pool. A diving-place, i.e. Pond for bathing.
When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Water. And genitive case, hudatos, etc. From the base of huetos; water literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To disturb, agitate, stir up, trouble. Of uncertain affinity; to stir or agitate.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: To come, go.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go down, come down, either from the sky or from higher land, descend. From kata and the base of basis; to descend.
A primary preposition; 'fore', i.e. In front of, prior to.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
